meanings.definition: (adjective) already shrunk before being sold or used
meanings.sent1: The preshrunk shirt fit perfectly without any further shrinking needed.
meanings.sent2: She always prefers to buy preshrunk clothes to avoid any surprises after washing.
meanings.sent3: The preshrunk sweater was so small, it looked like it belonged to a doll!
meanings.sent4: Her preshrunk jeans were like a second skin, hugging her every curve.
meanings.sent5: The preshrunk fabric felt smooth and snug against his skin.

meanings.definition: (verb) to shrink fabric before it is sold or used
meanings.sent1: Before sewing the dress, she preshrunk the fabric to prevent any future shrinking.
meanings.sent2: It is important to preshrink the material before making any garments.
meanings.sent3: He preshrunk the cloth so much that it ended up fitting his pet cat perfectly!
meanings.sent4: The idea preshrunk in his mind until it became a fully formed plan.
meanings.sent5: The fabric was preshrunk to ensure it maintained its size and shape after washing.
